document_data.name: Zillah
document_data.mainbody: '''Zillah''' was the [[lamia]] queen of the ruins of [[Unthalass]] in [[Unther]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Zillah was a devoted follower of [[Graz'zt]].
document_data.Activities: Zillah ruled over the lamia inhabiting the ruins of Unther's former capital.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, [[Gilgeam]] and his army arrived in the city from the lands of [[Shyr]] in the world of [[Abeir]]. In the {{YearlinkName|1487}}, Gilgeam, thanks to his pact with Graz'zt, reclaimed rulership of the city from the lamias.

Later Gilgeam sent [[Utu (human)|Utu]] and Zillah to steal [[Nanna-Sin]]'s divine spark. However, Utu died and Zillah was captured and put in jail.
